prompt1.name: Analyse Reading Material
prompt1.content: Analyse this reading material and provide some key points.

prompt2.name: 10 Short Answers
prompt2.content: Create a quiz of 10 short-answers questions from this reading material. No need to provide answers.

prompt3.name: 10 Multiple Choices
prompt3.content: Create a quiz of 10 multiple-choices questions from this reading material. Provide the answers for each of them as well.

prompt4.name: 10 True/False
prompt4.content: Create a quiz of 10 true/false questions from this reading material. Provide the answers for each of them as well.

prompt5.name: 10 Agree/Disagree
prompt5.content: Create a quiz of 10 agree/disagree questions from this reading material. Provide the answers for each of them as well.

prompt6.name: 10 Correct/Incorrect
prompt6.content: Create a quiz of 10 correct/incorrect questions from this reading material. Provide the answers for each of them as well.

prompt7.name: 10 Highlight
prompt7.content: Create a quiz of 10 questions starting with 'Please highlight in the paragraph:'. No need to provide answers.

prompt8.name: 10 Highlight
prompt8.content: Create a quiz of 10 questions starting with 'Please highlight in the paragraph:'. No need to provide answers.
